title: No chest for S- rank
body: Got an S- on Orianna some time ago but didnt receive any chest... (Champion owned before it was free and played on Draft)

replies.body:
Checked up on that game for you, and it looks like you had already obtained the chests you were able at that time. Your account can have up to 4 available chests, which should refresh after a week from when it dropped.

https://i.gyazo.com/488a2721759f1616132cea6409512300.png
Oh i didn't know that. Thanks for the info. :D
You can only get 4 chests a month as far as i know.
